articles.title: British passenger in seat 11A survives India plane crash, reports say - BBC
articles.description: Vishwashkumar Ramesh is believed to have survived the Air India crash that killed at least 200 people.
articles.content:
André Rhoden-Paul
British national Vishwashkumar Ramesh 
A man survived the Air India crash that killed at least 200 people, a police chief has told an Indian news agency.
